<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Get the module availability"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/security/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the availability of the module with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"The ID extracted from the route parameters.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Boolean value: true - module is enabled, false - module is disabled","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"boolean"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"BooleanWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
